name: Bright Minds Therapy
shortDescription: Specialized in dyslexia assessments and support.
longDescription: We offer tailored programs for children with dyslexia, guided by certified specialists.

name: Focus First Coaching
longDescription: Our ADHD coaching program focuses on executive functioning and emotional regulation.

name: The Learning Curve
shortDescription: Therapies tailored for kids on the spectrum.
longDescription: Individualized education plans and behavior therapy services for autistic children.

name: Neuro Boost
longDescription: We enhance memory, logic, and reasoning abilities in children with learning challenges.

name: Step Ahead Learning Center
shortDescription: Tutoring and support for all types of learning needs.
longDescription: Comprehensive tutoring in reading, writing, and math for students needing extra support.
